info.name: Winblox XP
info.description: Heads Up This version may or may not get any updates, but I can assure bug fixes. Windows XP for Roblox (Winblox) This theme will allow you to transform the Roblox Website into Windows XP. Of course, it will not be a literal exact copy of Windows XP, but it feels like it. Social Media You can follow me on Twitter @CreepTheFox for some possible sneak peeks on next update, or what I like to do on the internet. You can also follow me on my Roblox Profile for no special reason.
info.additionalInfo: Next Update Bugfixes only: -speaking to your friends should work again soon -looking at your robux should work again -gamepass thing is invisible? I need to look into it ----- I found a few more issues to address, this might take longer than I expect.

data.title: Robux bar cant be visible || Gamepass bar cant be visible
